Description: This Permission Allows The User To Add/Edit Contacts For The Organization.  Without This Permission The User Will Be Able To Access The Contact Tab And View Contacts But Will Get An Access Denied Message When Trying To Add Or Edit.
Allows Access To Admin > Home > Annoucnemnts. Currently Does Nothing.
Controls Whether The Landing Page Item To Manage Dimensions Is Enabled And Prevents Access To The Controller Methods Relating To Dimension Management.

This Permission Allows The User To Add, Edit Or Delete Data Entry Forms For Both Participants And Households.  Without This Permission The “Manage Data Entry Forms” Value Will Not Display In The Admin Dropdown Menu And The User Will Get Error Message When Selecting “Manage Data Entry Forms” Option From The Admin Homepage.
Allows Access To Admin > Manage Data Security.
Allows Complete Access To Create And Edit All Dynamic (Custom) Data. Has No Impact On A User'S Ability To Add,Edit,Or Delete The Actual Values Found Under Participant > Details Though.
This Permission Allows The User To Configure The Search Hierarchy.  Without This Permission The Hierarchy Management Function Will Be Suppressed From The Admin Dropdown Menu.
Allows Access To Admin > Home > Manage Participant Id Card Templates. But Not Directly From Admin Menu. Only Csa Shows Them In The Admin Menu Directly See Notes.
Allows Access To Participant > Outcome Measurement  > Impact Charts
Allows Access To Add/Edit All Default Lookup Values At A Site.

This Permission Allows The User To Manage Any Settings In The “Settings” Tab In Organization Management.  Without This Permission The User Will Be Able To Access The Tab But Will Get An Access Denied Message When Trying To Change A Setting Value.
This Permission Allows The User To Access And Edit Organization Details Through The Green “Edit” Button.  Without This Permission The User Will Get An Access Denied Message When Clicking The Button.
Obsolote Organization Setting.
Redundcant It Would Seem. Id Card Templates Have Their Own Indivdiual Permissions.
Allows Access To Scan Management. Tam Licenses, Edit Attendacne And Scanner Schedule
Allows Access To The Waivers Area Which Can Append Text To Olr Forms And Pif. Almost Useless.
This Permission Allows The User Access To The Csdw Data Mapping Function.  Without This Role The Menu Option Will Not Appear For The User.
This Permission Allows The User Access To The Nyoi Data Mapping Function.  Without This Role The Menu Option Will Not Appear For The User.
This Permission Allows The User To Remove An Activity And Its Associated Data From His/Her Own Organization And All Related Child Organizations Below It.
This Permission Allows The User To Remove A Person/Participant’S Record And Its Associated Data From His/Her Own Organization And All Related Child Organizations Below It.
This Permission Allows The User To Remove A Program And Its Associated Data (Including Activities) From His/Her Own Organization And All Related Child Organizations Below It.
Controls Whether The Landing Page Item To Submit Data Is Enabled And Prevents Access To Related Controller Methods.
Allows Full Access To Admin > Data Transfer For Importing / Uploading Excel Templates.
Controls Whether The Landing Page Item To Review Submission Status Is Enabled And Prevents Access To Related Controller Methods

This Is A Special, All-Encompassing Permission That Not Only Allows The User Access To The Entire Application But Allows The User To Perform Any Function In The Application As Well.  With This Permission An Administrator Will Automatically Have His/Her Account Updated With Newly Added Permissions And Can Then Distribute Them To Other Users In His/Her Organization.  It Is Recommended That This Permission Only Be Given To The Top Administrators Of The Organization.
This Permission Allows The User To Export Data To Access Via The Data Export Function In The Admin Dropdown.
Obsolete. There Is No Audit Log Accessible Through Trax. User Log Viewing Would Requrie Can Manage User Organizations
Obsolete. There Is No Audit Log Accessible Through Trax. User Log Viewing Would Requrie Can Manage User Organizations
Obsolete. There Is No Audit Log Accessible Through Trax. User Log Viewing Would Requrie Can Manage User Organizations
This Permission Allows The User To Close Cases In Case Management. Without This Permission The “Close” Action Button For Each Case Will Be Disabled.

This Permission Allows The User To Create/Add New Cases In Case Management.  Without This Permission The “Add New Case” Button In The Open Cases Grid Will Be Deactivated, As Well As The “New Case” Button In The Search Results Grid.

This Permission Allows The User To Delete Case Using The “Delete” Buttons In Either The Manage Open Cases Or Manage Closed Cases Grid.  Without This Permission The “Delete” Button Will Be Deactivated.
Allows You To Delete Case Contacts As Well As Edit Them. Without This (Or Csa/Case Admin, You Can'T Edit Or Delete Case Contacts)
Allows You To Click The Re-Open Case Button On A Case In The Grid Of The Case Management Landing Page.
This Permission Allows The User To View All Cases In Case Management.  Without This Permission The User Will Only See Cases That They Are Assigned To As Case Mgrs.

This Permission Allows The User To Add, View And Edit Any Cases To Which He/She Is Specifically Assigned.  This Permission Or The Case Admin Permission Is Necessary For Accessing The Case Management Module.  Without This Permission (Or The Case Admin Permission) The Case Management Value Will Be Suppressed From The Participant Dropdown Menu.
Allows Access Traxtalk Features And Enables The Manage System Notifications For Online Registration.
Allow The User To View The Trax Dashboards When Clicking The Dashboards Menu Item.

This Permission Allows The User To Add Households To The Database Through The Add Households Function On The Household Management Landing Page. Without This Permission The User Will Receive The “Access Denied” Message After The User Performs The Search And Then Selects The Data Entry Form.

This Permission Allows The User To Update/Edit Any Of The Data Fields That Are Part Of The Household Management Module.  This Includes Contact Fields Accessible Through The Household And Contact Information Tab In Participant Detail.

This Permission Allows The User To Assign Persons/Participants To Households Through The Manage Household Option Of The Household Management Landing Page. Without This Permission The User Will Receive The “Access Denied” Message At The End Of The Process.

This Permission Allows The User To View Household Information In The Household Management Module.  Without This Permission The User Will Be Denied Access To All The Options On The Household Management Landing Page, However, The User Can Still View Much Household Detail From The Household And Contact Information Tab In The Participant Detail Page.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Allows Access To The Program Discounts Tab Once You View A Moneytrax Account. And Of Course The Org Setting Needs To Be Enabled.
Allows The Ability To Create Billing Cycles At A Single Site Or Admin Site.
Allows Access To Participant > Moneytrax > Merge Tool.
Allows Access To The Delete Button On Accounts In The Grid After Searching In Moneytrax > Manage Accounts.
This Permission Allows The User To Charge Ad-Hoc Fees From Within Moneytrax.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
This Permission Will Grant A User Access To The Moneytrax Module. Along With This Permission The User Will Also Want To At Least Give The Permission Manage Accounts.
Allows Access To The Zero Account Button In The Grid After Searching In Moneytrax > Manage Accoutns. Assuming Of Course This Has Been Enabled By Speciacl Tfs Request In The Org Settings.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Redundant. Granted With Money Management.
Allows Full Access To Online Registration > New Account Queue To Approve, Deny Etc. But Also The Tab Item Itself To Link To Olr Now.
Allows Full Access To Participant > Others Served. Including Youth And Adult.

This Permission Allows The User To Create And Edit Logic Models.  Without This Permission User Will Access “Add New Logic Model” Button, And Can Access The “Edit” Button Of Logic Models, But Will Receive An “Access Denied” Message When Clicking Save.

This Permission Allows The User To Add And Edit (If At The Appropriate Organization Level) Metrics For Outcomes.  Without This Permission The User Will Receive The “Access Denied” Message When Clicking The “Add Metric” Or “Edit” Buttons.

This Permission Allows The User To Access The “Manage Outcomes” Option Of The Outcome Measurement Module.  Without This Permission The User Will Receive An “Access Denied” Message When Selecting The “Manage Outcomes” Option From The Outcome Measurement Landing Page.
Redundant As You Just Need Can Manage Outcomes But There May Be Some Use Not Accounte For Yet.

This Permission Allows The User To Add A New Person/Participant Into Trax.  Without This Permission The User Will Be Able To Select “Add/Re-Enroll” And Perform A Search But Selecting A Data Entry Form Will Call An “Access Denied” Message.

When “Need To Know” Is Enabled This Allows The User To Assign Users To Specific Participants So That The User Can Then Access The Participant’S Participant Detail Page And View The Participant’S Record.  Without This Permission The User Can Use The Participant Search Engine, Select “Assign User,” Choose A Start And End Date, But The User Will Receive An “Access Denied” Message After Selecting The “Assign Selected Staff” Button.

This Permission Allows Access To The Participant Search Dropdown Function “Charge Fee.” It Allows The User To Charge A Participant Fee Through Participant Search. Without This Function The User Will Be Able To Choose “Charge Fee” From The Dropdown Menu, Hit “Continue,” But When The User Selects The “Submit Charge” Function The User Will Get An “Access Denied” Message.

This Permission Allows The User To Access The Edit Fields In Participant Detail.    Without This Permission The User Will Get An “Access Denied” Message When The User Selects The Green Edit Button For Any Participant Data Field Within Participant Detail. It Is Important To Note That Not All The Edit Buttons In The Participant Management Module Are Part Of Participant Management. Some Of The Edit Buttons, (For Example Household Members) Take The User From The Participant Management Module To Other Trax Modules, And This Permission Has No Effect On These Edit Functions.
This Permission Is Required In Order For The User To Enroll Persons Into The Organization And Give Them A Membership

This Permission Allows The User Access To The Manage Participants Section Of The Participant Management Landing Page Where The User Can Merge Duplicate Participant Records And Manage Engagement Level Goals.

This Permission Allows The User To Merge Duplicate Participant Records (To Access This Function The User Will Also Need The Can Manage Participants Permission As This Is A Function Within The Manage Participants Section). Without This Permission, The User Can Begin The Process Of Merging Participants And Only Get The “Access Denied” Message After Choosing Two Participant Records And Selecting “Continue.”

This Permission Allows The User To Print Participant Ids. Without This Permission The User Can Select The “Quick Print Ids” Function From The Participant Search Dropdown Menu, Select A Template, But When The User Selects “Print” The User Will Get An “Access Denied” Message.

This Permission Allows The User To Promote A Participant One School Grade Level Through The Dropdown Menu In Participant Search.  This Permission Has No Effect On Access To The Academic Data Section Of The Participant Details Page, And The User Can Update School Data Without This Permission There.  Lack Of This Permission Will Only Deny The User The Ability Of Using The Promote To The Next Grade Level Function In Participant Search.

This Permission Allows The User To Record, Edit And Delete Organizational And Activity Attendance Through The Participant Search Page, And The Program Management Module. Without This Permission The System Prohibits The User From Using The “Record Attendance” Buttons For Activities Both In Programs/Activities And Participant Detail.

This Permission Allows The User To Register Participants For Surveys Through The Participant Search Function.  Without This Permission The User Will Receive The “Access Denied” Message Part Way Through The Registration Process.

This Permission Allows The User To Send An Email Message To Participant Through The Participant Search Dropdown Menu Function. This Permission Has No Effect On Email Functions Through The Survey Module Or Through Moneytrax.

This Permission Will Allow The Display Of Confidential Information Such As “School Lunch Program” Participation, Social Security Number, Household Income, Economic Status, Social Security Disability Status, Social Security, Temporary Assistance To Needy Families, Food Stamps, General Assistance, Veteran’S Compensation, Medicare/Medicaid And Other Government Assistance.  Without This Permission Confidential Fields Are Usually Expressed By Suppressed Data Fields That May Be Labeled “Confidential” As Opposed To An “Access Denied” Message.
This Permission Allows The Viewing Of Reports From The Participant Report Tab.
This Permission Allows Access To The Participant Management Module And Access To The Participant Details Page Through Other Trax Modules.

This Permission Allows User To Access Areas Of Trax That Contain Personably Identifiable Information (Pii) And To Gives Access To Users To View Reports Containing Pii.  Without This Permission Users Are Severely Limited On Their Ability To Navigate Trax And Perform Tasks.

This Permission Allows The User Access To The Admin Option In The Case Management Module And Access To All Cases (Unlike Case Manager Role Which Only Allows Access To Cases Which The User Is Assigned Specifically As A Case Manager).  A User Can Access And Modify Lookup Values In The Main Admin Section Without This Permission.
Allows Access To The Custom Reporting Tab
Allows Access To The After School Zone Report Report
Allows Access To The Annual Scorecard Report
Allows Access To The Duplicate People Roster Report
Allows Access To The Online Transactions List Report
Allows Access To The Online Transactions List Report
Allows You Access To The Cancel Enrollment Button In The Activity Roster Page.
Allows You Acces To The Drop Button In The Activity Roster Page.

This Permission Allows The User To Access The Activity Details Page And To Edit Any Non-Participant Related Details Of The Activity.  This Permission Has No Effect On The Roster, Waiting List, Events Or Attendance Tabs.

This Permission Allows The User The Ability To Access The Program Details Page And Edit Program Information. Without This Permission The User Will Not Have Access To “Edit Program” Button Found In The Programs Header Bar. This Permission Will Not Affect The Overview, Schedule, Documents, Links And Pictures Tabs As These Are Controlled By Separate Permissions.
This Permission Allows The User The Ability To Enroll Participants Into Activities.
Redundant Since Can Schedule Activity Is What Grants The Ability To Create Events. Nothing Lets You Edit Them, Not Even Csa

This Permission Allows The User To Update The Activity Enrollment Status Through The Activity Management Roster And Enrollment History In The Participant Detail Page. The User Can Manage Enrollment Status Such As Enroll, Cancel, No Show, Drop And Remove Participant From The Activity.
This Permission Allows The User To Add Documents That Are Associated With A Program. Without This Permission The “Access Denied” Message Is Displayed When User Clicks The “Add A Document” Button.
This Permission Allows The User To Add/Update Links That Are Associated With A Program.  Access Denied Message Is Given When User Clicks “Add A Link” Button.
This Permission Allows The User To Add Images Associated With A Program. Access Without This Permission The “Access Denied” Message Is Given When User Click The “Add A Picture” Button.
This Permission Allows User Access To Program Directory Where They Can View Programs And Activities In The Organization.
Allows User To Manage The Waiting List For Activities
Allows Access To The No Show Button In The Activity Roster Assuming All 3 Prerequestites
Allows Access To The Record Attendance/Service Button In The Activity Roster. As Well As The Enrollment History Tab Actions Menu Of An Activity.
This Permission Allows The User To Schedule An Activity From The Program Details Page. User Will Also Need The Can View Activities Permission, Or He/She Will Not Be Able To Access The Activity Grid.
This Permission Allows The User To View The Activity Information From The Program Schedule Tab.
This Permission Allows The User To View The Programs Information Landing Page.

This Permission Allows The User To Create A New Survey In The Survey Management Module. Without This Permission The User Will Receive The Following Message When Clicking “Create New Survey”
This Permission Allows The User To Convert An Extant Survey Into A Template.  The User Is Alerted By The Permissions Message After Clicking The “Create Template” Button.
Allows You To Finish The Process For A Specific Survey

Permission: Can View Survey Table Of Contents
Description: Can Access A Respondents Survey With Page And Questions Answered
This Permission Allows The User To Close Out The Active Period Of The Survey.  Without This Permission The “Close” Command In The Survey Detail Page Is Deactivated.

This Permission Allows The User To Create And Modify Surveys And Survey Templates.  Without This Permission The “Create Surveys” And “Manage Templates” Are Deactivated On The Surveytrax Landing Page, As Are The “Design,” “View Template,” And “View Details” Buttons On The Manage Surveys Page.
This Permission Allows The User To Export Survey Results Into Other Formats.  Without This Permission The “Export Survey Answers” Option On The Survey Detail Page Is Deactivated.
Allows Users To Export Survey Results
This Permission Allows Access To The Distribution Option On The Survey Detail Page.  Without This Permission The Distribution Option Is Deactivated.
This Permission Allows Access To The Survey Questions Option On The Survey Details Page.  Without This Permission The Survey Questions Option Is Deactivated.

This Permission Allows The User Access To The Survey Scoring Option On The Survey Detail Page, Where The User Can Set Answer Values For Questions And Create Metrics Based On Survey Questions.  Without This Permission The Survey Scoring Option Will Be Deactivated.
This Permission Allows The User To Access The Print Survey Options On The Survey Detail Page.  Lack Of This Permission Disables The Option.
This Permission Allows The User To Publish A Survey For Distribution (Activating The Survey).  Without This Permission The “Publish” Command On The Survey Detail Page Will Be Deactivated.

This Permission Allows The User To Recall The Survey From Publication If Changes Need To Be Made To The Survey (Reminder; Recalling The Survey Will Delete Any Data Accumulated Prior To The Recall) .  Without This Permission The Recall Command On The Survey Detail Page Is Deactivated.

There Are Two Areas In Surveytrax Where The User Can Remove Or Delete A Survey; There Is A “Delete” Button In The Manage Surveys Grid, And There Is A Remove Survey Command On The Survey Detail Page.  This Permission Allows The User Access To Either Of These.  Without This Permission Both The Delete Button And The Remove Command Will Be Deactivated.
This Permission Allows The User To Access The Survey Kiosy For Data Input Via The Staff Or Individual Taking The Surevey.
This Permission Allows Access To The Appearance Tab Of The Survey Options Option On The Survey Detail Page.  Without This Permission The Appearance Tab Will Not Display.
This Permission Allows Access To The Collection Tab Of The Survey Options Option On The Survey Detail Page. Without This Permission The Collection Tab Will Not Display.
This Permission Allows Access To The Exclusion Tab Of The Survey Options Option On The Survey Detail Page. Without This Permission The Exclusion Tab Will Not Display.
This Permission Allows Access To The Linked Surveys Tab Of The Survey Options Option On The Survey Detail Page. Without This Permission The Linked Surveys Tab Will Not Display.
This Permission Allows Access To The Security Tab Of The Survey Options Option On The Survey Detail Page. Without This Permission The Security Tab Will Not Display.
This Permission Allows Access To The Settings Tab Of The Survey Options Option On The Survey Detail Page. Without This Permission The Settings Tab Will Not Display.
This Permission Allows The User Access To The Reports Option On The Surveytrax Landing Page.  Without This Permission The Reports Option Is Deactivated.
Allows You To Register Tam Device(S) For The Organization.
Placeholder Permission
Placeholder Permission
Placeholder Permission
Placeholder Permission
Allow The User To Add Additional Users To His/Her Organization. Without This Permission The “Add User” Button Will Not Display On The Manage User Access Page.
This Permission Allows The User To Perform Search Actions On Multiple Users At Once. I.E., Enroll Participants, Send Emails, Etc.

This Permission Allows The User To Create/Edit Groups Of Permissions Customized To User Tasks. Without This Permission The “Manage User Groups” Values Will Not Appear In The Admin Dropdown Menu And The User Will Get An “Access Denied” Message Is She/He Tries To Access The Module Through The Admin Home Page.

This Permission Allows The User Access To The Organization Management Module.  Without This Permission The Manage Organization Value Is Suppressed From The Admin Dropdown And The Manage Organizations Icon In The Admin Homepage Is De-Activated.
This Permission Allows The User To Manager User Permissions And Assign Security Groups.

This Permission Allows The User To Add Roles/Permissions To A User.  Without This Permission An “Access Denied” Message Is Displayed After Clicking The “Manage” Button At The Bottom Of The Permissions Grid.

This Permission Allows The User Access To The User Management Module Where The User Can Manage Trax User Accounts. Without This Permission The “Manage Users” Values Will Not Display In The Admin Dropdown Menu And The Manage Users Icon In The Admin Homepage Will Be De-Activated.
This Permisison Allows The User To Update User Information.
This Permission Allows The User To View All Users At All Sites.
This Permission Allows The User To View Surveys Through The Manage Surveys Grid.
This Permission Allows The User To View The Participants To Which A User Is Assigned.
Allow The User To View User Profiles In Admin.
